message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $90. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you consider that?
I understand your offer of $70, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. It's a great product, and I think it's worth a bit more than that. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $85. Can you consider $75?
I understand your offer of $75, but I'm still thinking more along the lines of $82. It's a unique product, and I think it's worth a bit more than that. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $82. Can you consider $78?

I understand your offer of $78, but I'm still thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm getting close to accepting your offer, but I want to get as close to my minimum price as possible. What do you think?
